channel.title: Comments on: A Mean Idea to Call My Own

item.title: By: BigFreak
item.dc:creator: BigFreak
item.description: Yeah, UO was the king-daddy. Really hope something can fill its shoes one day. Liking the site btw. Inspiring me to follow suit in some way. Good stuff.
item.content:encoded: Yeah, UO was the king-daddy. Really hope something can fill its shoes one day. Liking the site btw. Inspiring me to follow suit in some way. Good stuff.

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description: I don't know. Quite a few of the MS players were over in UO from time to time and I remember they'd asked me to try it a few times, I just never did. Probably I was too busy with school (i.e. drinking and sleeping around) to commit to another game. I was pretty reluctant to try EQ as it was, but abso-fucking-lutely everyone was going there so I got sucked into the vortex.
item.content:encoded: I don’t know. Quite a few of the MS players were over in UO from time to time and I remember they’d asked me to try it a few times, I just never did. Probably I was too busy with school (i.e. drinking and sleeping around) to commit to another game. I was pretty reluctant to try EQ as it was, but abso-fucking-lutely everyone was going there so I got sucked into the vortex.
